title: [GAMEPLAY]Pool Party Graves splash art
body: There is a Classic Graves splash art instead of a Pool Party Graves splash art in the loading screen when playing Pool Party Graves. The champion is still called the Pool Party Graves and works as a Pool Party Graves in the game.

replies.body:
Hey FtF TheKrakonoš! 

This was an issue that occurred because we were updating Graves' base splash to include the cigar. We got a bit carried away with the update, and all loading screen cards showed the base! We micropatched a fix last night, so everything should be back to normal. Thanks for the report! :)
